title: ICELAND Three Bedroom Apartment For Immediate Sale
details:
Luxury THREE Bedroom Un-Furnished Apartment Available For Immediate SALE at ICELAND RESIDENCIES.

This is a Three Bedroom apartment with a Large Living & Dining Area.

Direct Sea View from the balcony and on a Higher floor.

Laundry + shopping facility - Galle Face Hotel.

Mini Super Market.

24 hours security

Designated parking

For Viewing And Other Further Information Of The Apartment, Please Do Not Hesitate In Contacting Us

Web Site: www.menavid.com
